Title: Authorizes the city of Little Falls, in the county of Herkimer, to offer certain retirement options to police officer Justin Dibble
Summary: Authorizes the city of Little Falls, in the county of Herkimer, to offer participation in the optional twenty year retirement plan to police officer Justin Dibble.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize the city of Little Falls, in the county of Herkimer, to offer certain retirement options to police officer Justin Dibble
